column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As far as ramen goes
column2: JINYA hits every note - the noodles
column4: the succulent meat and toppings. I opted to try the Tonkotsu Black with Pork Soboro. Frankly
column5: ground pork is a top I've never particularly enjoyed. But JINYA's is definitely the best I've had - it's seasoned really well
column6: becoming a topping I enjoyed on the same level as chashu. Their seasoning is on point with their chicken soboro as well.
